CommandDefinition.Name: listxmomodsnames
CommandDefinition.Description: Show the mapping of XMOM Storables to corresponding ODS storables including extensions.

Argument.Name: applicationName
Argument.Description: Show only entries for this application

Argument.Name: versionName
Argument.Description: Show only entries for this version (requires applicationName parameter)

Argument.Name: fqDatatypeName
Argument.Description: Show only entries for this XMOM storable

Argument.Name: workspaceName
Argument.Description: Show only entries for this workspace
